Text:
Dude.... well... I found only one pic the was visually pleasing in your collection, but...
 DUDE! WTF?! 
There is a REALLLY disturbing pic of what borderlines on child porn (no it doesn't borderline it's a fucking child porn alright). (to those that haven't seen it... DON'T... the best way to describe it,  it's a manga version of an Asari kid with a hermaphrodite.

So dude: i'll seed your torrent to the 1:1 ratio only because i give back what I take, and it's not my place to judge... but...

Buddy if that's your "damage" maybe it's better you get off on pictures instead of the real kids, BUT FOR GODS SAKE seek some help, and just because i'm trying... and i'm really trying to keep this comment "civilized", when in reality I think of ripping the fucking throats out of fucks that enjoy this kind of thing, don't confuse it with an approval of any kind.

And I'm even trying to find an excuse for you that you might have downloaded the whole batch not knowing what exactly you're getting.... but... you must have saw that...

Really... with sincerity... get some professional fucking help.
On second thought... no I can't even seed it with a clear conscience  to 1:1. And hopefully this torrent will dieout.

You mean the 6 Loli Liara and Futa Femshep pic's? Liara is over 100 years old... The artist said that since Asari can live for over one thousand years they wanted to make a younger liara.

And in no way shape or form is it child porn. kind of insulting.

After reading the comments there was no way i could not download these just to satisfy my morbid curiosity. 

After having done so, i have to agree with RafVne2 100%. 

A transsexual with a giant cock fucking a child? (yes, i know Asari live for a thousand years, etc, etc. But here in the real world, it's a drawing of a child). Whoever drew those pics needs to be locked up. Whoever finds them attractive needs to be locked up. Whoever defends their existence needs to be locked up.

There are some seriously fucking weird people in this world.
Welp.. it IS cartoon porn. anywho i've tried to delete the torrents but can't for some reason.

So... how should I put it...
